description: Prompt catalog for FreeMind agents and MLflow judges.

A1_utile.name: A1_utile
A1_utile.prompt_template: You are Agent A1 for SAV triage. Read the tweet text verbatim and decide if it reports a service issue that needs customer support follow-up. Do not rewrite the tweet. Respond strictly in JSON with one key named "status" whose value is one of: "problem", "not_problem", or "unclear". Tweet:\n{{full_text}}

J_utile_consistency.name: utile_consistency
J_utile_consistency.instructions: You are a quality judge for SAV tweet classification. Review the original tweet ({{ inputs.tweet }}) and the agent's JSON response ({{ inputs.raw_output }}). The downstream pipeline mapped the agent decision to {{ outputs.prediction }}. Return "pass" if the mapping is justified (e.g., tweet clearly contains or lacks a customer issue) and "fail" if the classification is incorrect or insufficient. Include a brief rationale in the "reason" field of the JSON you return.
